game.title: Saving the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the evil sorcerer
game.description: The kingdom's beloved princess has been kidnapped by an evil sorcerer. You, as the brave warrior, must embark on a perilous journey to rescue her from the sorcerer's clutches. Are you up for the challenge?
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the eternal gratitude of the kingdom

tasks.description: Talk to villagers, visit local taverns, and collect any information about the sorcerer's whereabouts
Retrieve the magical artifacts hidden in the Cave of Mysteries, as they may aid in defeating the sorcerer
Confront the evil sorcerer in his dark fortress and defeat him in an epic battle
Free the princess from the sorcerer's prison and ensure her safe return to the kingdom
